Printing Info: Print or Save the PDF as A3 instead of A4 to print the whole resume and not just a part of it
OPTIONAL_FIELDS: Remove the key of these fields and they won't be rendered in the CV: websiteLink,websiteText
STYLE_OPTIONS: There are 6 style options available: 1,2,3,4,5,6. Select one of them in the key: 'Style Number' to render a different style
